sentences.sentence: He was given experimental chemical castration as a "treatment".
sentences.translation: 当时处于实验中的化学阉割作为对他的“治疗”。

sentences.sentence: Figuring that a few broken bones was better than castration, he jumped out of the window after the boulder.
sentences.translation: 考虑到断几根骨头也比做太监强，他随着那块大石头跳出了窗户。

sentences.sentence: And someone started leaving chopped-up sausages on his car, a possible reference to castration. Bill and his family moved house.
sentences.translation: 有些人开始用剁碎的腊肠砸他的汽车，Bill和他的家人不得不搬家，这是个例子供参考。
